page.title: 01SIX HAMPSHIRE VILLAGES.
page.content: Arable and grazing land covers most of this beautiful rural area which includes the villages of Amport and Monxton, Kimpton, Thruxton, Fyfield and Weyhill. Thatched cottages contrast with modern houses and council estates. Chalk streams meander and footpaths link the farms. Primary schools at Amport, Kimpton and Weyhill serve the area. There are five churches, three village halls and eight public houses. Amport has a Village Green and Amport House, while Monxton Village Hall serves both villages. Kimpton and Thruxton skirt Thruxton aerodrome and racing circuit. Racehorses are trained at Fyfield. Weyhill has Dunnings construction firm. The busy A303 runs through the village and a bypass is under construction, passing the local Hawk Conservancy.
